org.svvrl.goal.cmd

Interface Expression

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractExpression, AccCommand, AlphabetCommand, AperiodicCommand, BatchCommand, BinaryExpr, ClassificationCommand, CloneCommand, CloseCommand, CommandExecutor, CommandExpression, ComplementExpression, ConcatenationCommand, Constant, ContainmentCommand, ConvertCommand, DeterministicCommand, DeterminizationCommand, EchoCommand, EmptinessCommand, EquivalenceCommand, GenerateCommand, HomomorphismCommand, ImportCommand, InputTestCommand, IntersectionCommand, IsomorphismCommand, LayoutCommand, LoadCommand, Lval, MinimizationCommand, MinusMinus, NamesCommand, NullExpr, OmegaCommand, OpenCommand, ParityCommand, PlusPlus, PreferenceCommand, ProductCommand, PromelaCommand, PropertyCommand, QPTLCommand, ReadlineCommand, ReduceCommand, ReplaceCommand, RepositoryCommand, ReverseCommand, SatisfiabilityCommand, SaveCommand, SeparationCommand, SeqCommand, ShellExpr, SimplifyCommand, SimulatedCommand, SimulationEquivalenceCommand, SleepCommand, SolveExtension.SolveCommand, SplitCommand, StatCommand, TestCommand, TimeExpr, TranslateCommand, UnaryExpr, UnionCommand, ValidityCommand

    public interface Expression
    An Expression provides an interface of expressions in GOAL scripts.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

        java.lang.Object eval(Context ctx)
               throws EvaluationException
        Evaluates this expression in a specified context.
        Parameters:
        ctx - a context
        Returns:
        the result of evaluating this expression in the context ctx
        Throws:
        EvaluationException - if there is an error in evaluating this expression
